sourcesContent:
<template>
    <Pie :data="data" :options="options" />
</template>

<script>
import { Chart as ChartJS, ArcElement, Tooltip, Legend } from 'chart.js'
import { Pie } from 'vue-chartjs'

ChartJS.register(ArcElement, Tooltip, Legend)
export default{
    name: 'LanguagesUsed',
    props: {
        languagesMap: Object
    },
    components: {
        Pie
    },
    data(){
        return{
            data: {
                labels: this.languagesMap.keys(),
                datasets:[
                    {
                        backgroundColor: ['#41B883'],
                        data: this.languagesMap.values()
                    }
                ]
            },
            options: {
                responsive: true,
                maintainAspectRatio: false
            }
        }
    }
}



</script>

<style>
</style>
